attrs.placeholder: Person involved in the creation of a resource.

isCreatorOf.description: Person involved in the creation of a resource.
isCreatorOf.title: Is creator

attrs.placeholder: A person who oversees the details related to the publication format of the resource. (DataCite: Editor)

isEditorOf.description: A person who oversees the details related to the publication format of the resource. (DataCite: Editor)
isEditorOf.title: Is editor

attrs.placeholder: Person tasked with reviewing, enhancing, cleaning, or standardizing metadata and the associated data submitted for storage, use, and maintenance within a data centre or repository. (DataCite: DataCurator)

isCuratorOf.description: Person tasked with reviewing, enhancing, cleaning, or standardizing metadata and the associated data submitted for storage, use, and maintenance within a data centre or repository. (DataCite: DataCurator)
isCuratorOf.title: Is data curator

attrs.placeholder: Person with knowledge of how to access, troubleshoot, or otherwise field issues related to the resource. (DataCite: ContactPerson),Person or Organisation that can be contacted regarding information about a Resource or a Project.

isContactOf.description: Person with knowledge of how to access, troubleshoot, or otherwise field issues related to the resource. (DataCite: ContactPerson),Person or Organisation that can be contacted regarding information about a Resource or a Project.
isContactOf.title: Is contact

attrs.placeholder: Person officially designated as head of project team or subproject team instrumental in the work necessary to development of the resource. (DataCite: ProjectLeader)

isPrincipalInvestigatorOf.description: Person officially designated as head of project team or subproject team instrumental in the work necessary to development of the resource. (DataCite: ProjectLeader)
isPrincipalInvestigatorOf.title: Is principal investigator

attrs.placeholder: Person or organisation that issued a contract or under the auspices of which a work has been written, printed, published, developed, etc. (DataCite: Sponsor),Person or Organisation which provided funding for the project.

isFunderOf.description: Person or organisation that issued a contract or under the auspices of which a work has been written, printed, published, developed, etc. (DataCite: Sponsor),Person or Organisation which provided funding for the project.
isFunderOf.title: Is funder

attrs.placeholder: Institution (A) responsible for preservation of a resource (B).,Typically, the organisation allowing the resource to be available on the internet through the provision of its hardware/software/operating support. (DataCite: HostingInstitution)

isHostingOf.description: Institution (A) responsible for preservation of a resource (B).,Typically, the organisation allowing the resource to be available on the internet through the provision of its hardware/software/operating support. (DataCite: HostingInstitution)
isHostingOf.title: Is hosting

attrs.placeholder:
Agent (person, group, organisation) (A) who was actively involved in creating/curating/editing a Resource, a Collection or in a Project (B). Any person or institution making a significant contribution to the development and/or maintenance of the resource, but whose contribution does not “fit” to another already defined role. (cf. DataCite: Other)
This is a generic property. Use one of the more specific sub-properties where possible.

isContributorOf.description:
Agent (person, group, organisation) (A) who was actively involved in creating/curating/editing a Resource, a Collection or in a Project (B). Any person or institution making a significant contribution to the development and/or maintenance of the resource, but whose contribution does not “fit” to another already defined role. (cf. DataCite: Other)
This is a generic property. Use one of the more specific sub-properties where possible.
isContributorOf.title: Contributed to

attrs.placeholder: Person responsible for creating metadata.
Person or organisation (A) responsible for submitting a Resource or Collection (B) for hosting to the repository.

isDepositorOf.description: Person or organisation (A) responsible for submitting a Resource or Collection (B) for hosting to the repository.
isDepositorOf.title: Is depositor

attrs.placeholder: Author of resource, who will appear in the citation of it. The author is used to indicate the originator of any written work. For any other types of work use 'Creator'.

isAuthorOf.description: Author of resource, who will appear in the citation of it. The author is used to indicate the originator of any written work. For any other types of work use 'Creator'.
isAuthorOf.title: Author

attrs.placeholder: Generic indication of what is covered/mentioned in the resource (its content) along various dimensions (subject, space, time). Use the more specific sub-properties where possible. E. g. the time span '1874 - 1883' for a set of images depicting the construction of the parliament in Vienna, the actor 'Mozart' for an edition about Mozart or the place 'Vienna' for a collection of city maps of Vienna.

isCoverageOf.description: Generic indication of what is covered/mentioned in the resource (its content) along various dimensions (subject, space, time). Use the more specific sub-properties where possible. E. g. the time span '1874 - 1883' for a set of images depicting the construction of the parliament in Vienna, the actor 'Mozart' for an edition about Mozart or the place 'Vienna' for a collection of city maps of Vienna.
isCoverageOf.title: Is covered in

attrs.placeholder: Any person or institution (A) which the given resource (B) mentions or is about.

isActorOf.description: Any person or institution (A) which the given resource (B) mentions or is about.
isActorOf.title: Is actor

attrs.placeholder: Person or Organisation (A) responsible for choosing a license for the Collection or Resource (B).

isLicensorOf.description: Person or Organisation (A) responsible for choosing a license for the Collection or Resource (B).
isLicensorOf.title: Is licensor

attrs.placeholder: A Person or Organisation (A) owning a Collection or Resource (B).

isOwnerOf.description: A Person or Organisation (A) owning a Collection or Resource (B).
isOwnerOf.title: Is owner

attrs.placeholder: Person or institution owning or managing property rights, including intellectual property rights over the resource. (DataCite: RightsHolder)

isRightsHolderOf.description: Person or institution owning or managing property rights, including intellectual property rights over the resource. (DataCite: RightsHolder)
isRightsHolderOf.title: Is rights holder

attrs.placeholder: Title or name of Project, Collection or Resource. Is also used as name for an organisation.

hasTitle.description: Title or name of Project, Collection or Resource. Is also used as name for an organisation.
hasTitle.title: Title

attrs.placeholder:
Unique identifier given by ACDH and used in ACDH systems, as well as identifiers with a stable URL or URI assigned by other parties, e. g. a DOI, a geonames ID or an URN.
Input as URI.
Handles belong into acdh:hasPID and all other identifiers without URL or URI, like local assigned ones, project numbers or inventory numbers into acdh:hasNonLinkedIdentifier.

hasIdentifier.description:
Unique identifier given by ACDH and used in ACDH systems, as well as identifiers with a stable URL or URI assigned by other parties, e. g. a DOI, a geonames ID or an URN.
Input as URI.
Handles belong into acdh:hasPID and all other identifiers without URL or URI, like local assigned ones, project numbers or inventory numbers into acdh:hasNonLinkedIdentifier.
hasIdentifier.title: Identifier

attrs.placeholder: Professional or academic title of a Person.

hasPersonalTitle.description: Professional or academic title of a Person.
hasPersonalTitle.title: Title

attrs.placeholder: First name of a Person.
Last Name of Person.
Adress associated with a Person or Organisation. Use sub-properties to input detailed information like postcode, city and country.

hasAddress.description: Adress associated with a Person or Organisation. Use sub-properties to input detailed information like postcode, city and country.
hasAddress.title: Address

attrs.placeholder: First line of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.

hasAddressLine1.description: First line of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.
hasAddressLine1.title: Adresse Line 1

attrs.placeholder: Second line of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.

hasAddressLine2.description: Second line of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.
hasAddressLine2.title: Adresse Line 2

attrs.placeholder: Postcode or zip code of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.

hasPostcode.description: Postcode or zip code of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.
hasPostcode.title: Postcode/zip code

attrs.placeholder: City or Town of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.

hasCity.description: City or Town of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.
hasCity.title: City/Town

attrs.placeholder: State, region or province of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.

hasRegion.description: State, region or province of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.
hasRegion.title: State/region/province

attrs.placeholder: Country of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.

hasCountry.description: Country of adress associated with a Person or Organisation.
hasCountry.title: Country

attrs.placeholder: Used to add URLs to for organisations, agents, projects etc. E. g. a project web page or a personal page of a person.

hasUrl.description: Used to add URLs to for organisations, agents, projects etc. E. g. a project web page or a personal page of a person.
hasUrl.title: URL

attrs.placeholder: E-mail associated with a Person or Organisation.

hasEmail.description: E-mail associated with a Person or Organisation.
hasEmail.title: E-mail

attrs.placeholder: Used to link a Person to an Organisation or an Organisation (e.g. department) to another Organisation (institution)

isMemberOf.description: Used to link a Person to an Organisation or an Organisation (e.g. department) to another Organisation (institution)
isMemberOf.title: Is member of

attrs.placeholder: A verbose description of certain aspects (content, coverage, completeness, extent, motivation, etc.) of an entity. This is the most generic property, use more specific sub-properties where applicable.

hasDescription.description: A verbose description of certain aspects (content, coverage, completeness, extent, motivation, etc.) of an entity. This is the most generic property, use more specific sub-properties where applicable.
hasDescription.title: Description

attrs.placeholder:
Agent (person, group, organisation) (B) who was actively involved in creating/curating/editing a Resource, a Collection or in a Project (A). Any person or institution making a significant contribution to the development and/or maintenance of the resource, but whose contribution does not “fit” to another already defined role. (cf. DataCite: Other)
This is a generic property. Use one of the more specific sub-properties where possible.

hasContributor.description:
Agent (person, group, organisation) (B) who was actively involved in creating/curating/editing a Resource, a Collection or in a Project (A). Any person or institution making a significant contribution to the development and/or maintenance of the resource, but whose contribution does not “fit” to another already defined role. (cf. DataCite: Other)
This is a generic property. Use one of the more specific sub-properties where possible.
hasContributor.title: Contributor

attrs.placeholder: Person or Organisation responsible for creating metadata for a Resource or Collection.

hasMetadataCreator.description: Person or Organisation responsible for creating metadata for a Resource or Collection.
hasMetadataCreator.title: Metadata creator

attrs.placeholder: Date / point in time, either marking an event in the life cycle of an entity (Project, Collection or Resource) or used to describe temporal coverage of an entity (e.g. project dealing with historical texts from 17th century).

hasDate.description: Date / point in time, either marking an event in the life cycle of an entity (Project, Collection or Resource) or used to describe temporal coverage of an entity (e.g. project dealing with historical texts from 17th century).
hasDate.title: Date

attrs.placeholder: A generic indication of any relation between two resources. Preferably use any of the more specific subproperties.

relation.description: A generic indication of any relation between two resources. Preferably use any of the more specific subproperties.
relation.title: Relation

attrs.placeholder: URL of landing page. It should be created automatically by the system.

hasLandingPage.description: URL of landing page. It should be created automatically by the system.
hasLandingPage.title: Landing page

attrs.placeholder: Any other notes for the Project, Collection or Resource not fitting into an existing category. (DataCite: descriptionType Other)

hasNote.description: Any other notes for the Project, Collection or Resource not fitting into an existing category. (DataCite: descriptionType Other)
hasNote.title: Note

attrs.placeholder: The date of the last update/change to the resource.

hasUpdatedDate.description: The date of the last update/change to the resource.
hasUpdatedDate.title: Date of last update
